name: Academy Ekko
description: NOTICE FROM THE DEAN: Ekko is henceforth suspended from Academy grounds for behavior including (but not limited to) illegal use of chemistry equipment, illegal use of Academy electronics, splitting time streams in order to skip class, and vandalism of athletics department property.
